com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl

Class BeanFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl.BeanFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanService

    public class BeanFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements BeanService

    Implementation of BeanService for storing beans that have been configured in infinitum.cfg.xml. BeanFactory also acts as a service locator for ApplicationContext.

    Version:
    1.0 04/23/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

      • loadBean

        public java.lang.Object loadBean(java.lang.String name)
                          throws InfinitumConfigurationException
        Description copied from interface: BeanService
        Retrieves an instance of the bean with the given name. The name is configured in infinitum.cfg.xml.
        Specified by:
        loadBean in interface BeanService
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the bean to retrieve
        Returns:
        an instance of the bean.
        Throws:
        InfinitumConfigurationException - if the bean does not exist or could not be constructed

        Parameters:

        name - the name of the bean
        beanClass - the class name of the bean
